I've already referred 7 friends... 5 are level  30 and the other two are 11 and 26 all are active. tried to redeem my award and Riot said they already sent it out. I really hope I get it in my email soon... because if I open a ticket about it I doubt I'll get an answer in 30 days. Still don't have one from a long time ago
Now, if only {{champion:21}} were to go to a harrowing party in a bunny costume.
Still waiting on French Maid {{champion:23}}

A friend of mine worked as an IT support operator for a major company and would would refer his customers. He helped something like 12-25 people per shift and after about 2 months he had over 100 referrals. Rito denied him the rewards and claimed he must be botting to accumulate that much volume in such a short time. He got his boss to email, call AND snail mail Riot, but they still denied him. He never played League again in disgust.

one of those stories that won't happen again. RIP RAF.
Coming from Riot, this doesn't surprise me.
It's sad but I believe you.

Well given the sheer volume of support requests Riot gets on a daily basis it's not surprising they would shrug off something like this... At least until now. It's a good thing they are removing RAF (your example exposes one way this system is flawed). Hopefully Riot will get some better system in place and your buddy will get the rewards he rightly deserves. :)
Hitler runs rito confirmed

Too many people are already playing this so its hard to find people to referral
{{champion:32}}

I really don't like that idea of just getting rid of the skins. Maybe re-release them as 975 or 750 RP for medieval twitch and 520RP for the Warwick skin? And give the people who got them from refer a friend the vintage edition?
It's just that there are people like myself who joined during the boom of people playing League and it was and still is impossible to get anyone to play for more than 5 or even 15 levels without doing it yourself which is a banable offense. I was hoping to get the skin one day legit from bugging people or just actually referring people. But sadly anyone I knew already played or didn't like the game. (Mind you this is the 2 years of me playing I have only gotten 1 person to play to level 15 and that was a friend I bugged to no end )

On a side note though this is also even sadder news cause it is a kind of sign that League has hit it's peak. 

R.I.P. Refer system
And R.I.P. Gray Warwick and Medieval Twitch. 1 good skin and 1 amazing skin gone to rest.

On putting these skins on sale:

The players who earned these skins did a cool thing with a social feature. Simply putting the skins on sale cheapens those players efforts and honestly would feel a little money grubby to me. 

On the skins coming back:

There's no concrete plans yet, but it makes more sense to attach these skins to some other, future social feature because that matches the original spirit of how Grey and Medieval were earned.

ive been trying to get my friends and siblings to play league for ages XD for the sole purpose of medieval twitch Q.Q only one of them have made it to level 10 the other 2 are level 5-6 and just stoped play..... I shall never know the joy of the medieval twitch {{item:3070}} (untill i can earn it some other way)
( Quick, just level the accounts yourself! )

why not just incorporate this into the Facebook feature, where if you play 10-15 games with x people you connected on FB; will unlock the skins once you "share" you achievement on FB; RITO gets league out to their friends on FB and it is a more realistic way of spreading the game to people.

Lets say you referred a friend and they didn't hit lvl 10 yet. If they hit 10 after the retirement do I still get my reward or no? @rito
No, it won't count.  When the program shuts down that will be the end.  You will no longer be able to redeem rewards.
just to be sure, if find 5 friend already playing league and all of us do 5 smurf refer to the other player, is this against the "law" or self smurf only are ban worthy^^

This is a quote from the Terms and Conditions of the program:

"The referred individual must not have had a previous LoL Player account or be a current LoL Player for purposes of the referral."

http://rewards.na.leagueoflegends.com/terms-and-conditions
If i have referred someone to the game previously but had forgotten to get them to say they referred me is it to late to get them as credit?
if i dont have these champion ,can i get these skin?
IF you get enough referrals up to level 10, you'll get the champion unlocked when you unlock the skin.
I wish I knew this when I spent 4800 IP on Twitch {{item:3070}}
Wait, why exactly are you getting rid of RAF?

They are removing RAF because with or without, there is no observable change in social gameplay. Either people are referring bot accounts or almost no one at all. They observed that game events - like Pool Party, Party IP, and friend discovery were doing a better job. So the game events are actually promoting friends playing the game together than the actual RAF, which is a bit odd. Bu that is why.

TL;DR: Game events are doing better what RAF should have been doing.
and graves cant have his cigar {{champion:104}}
how can you check to see how many you have?

http://rewards.na.leagueoflegends.com/

Go there and log in and you'll see your referrals at the bottom.
